BeeLikedDBIP.Instructions: Remember to activate it by going to System > Geolocation and selecting DB-IP as Location Provider.
BeeLikedDBIP.PleaseGetYourAPIKeyFrom: Leave this field empty to use the free version or get a commercial API key from db-ip.com.
BeeLikedDBIP.PleaseEnterAValidAPIKey: Please enter a valid API key.
BeeLikedDBIP.Disclaimer: This is a non-official DB-IP (db-ip.com) plugin created by BeeLiked (BeeLiked.com).
BeeLikedDBIP.LocationProviderInfoDescription: This location provider uses the %1$s API to guess visitor's Continent, Country, State and City based on their IP address.%2$s %3$sAPI Key: %4$s %5$s %6$s %7$s
BeeLikedDBIP.LocationProviderInfoExtraMessageFreePlan: You are using a free API Key. You can configure a commercial API Key under System > DB-IP' menu option.
BeeLikedDBIP.LocationProviderInfoExtraMessageCommerci: You are using a commercial API Key.
